meanings.sent1: The room was dingily lit by a single flickering candle.
meanings.sent2: She walked dingily through the dark alley, trying to find her way out.
meanings.sent3: The old cat sat dingily in the corner, looking like it had seen better days.
meanings.sent4: The memories of the past lingered dingily in the dusty attic of her mind.
meanings.sent5: The abandoned house stood dingily on the edge of town, a shadow of its former self.

meanings.sent1: The dingily car sat in the driveway, waiting to be washed.
meanings.sent2: Her dingily hands showed she had been working hard in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The dog came back from the park looking dingily happy, covered in mud from head to toe.
meanings.sent4: The old book was dingily worn, its pages yellowed with age and use.
meanings.sent5: The dingily walls of the abandoned building seemed to whisper stories of neglect and decay.
